channel.title: Others on Behind Bars
channel.description: Recent content in Others on Behind Bars

item.title: Example config.toml
item.description: Example config.toml configuration for Minimo: baseURL = "apoorv74.github.io" title = "Behind Bars" # for smart copyright line, leave this blank and check [params.copyright] copyright = "" theme = "minimo" disqusShortname = "apoorv74githubio" googleAnalytics = "UA-66023783-1" Paginate = 5 preserveTaxonomyNames = true enableRobotsTXT = true # generate robots.txt # Syntax Highlighting ( https://gohugo.io/content-management/syntax-highlighting/ ) pygmentsCodefences = true # Missing translations will default to this content language defaultContentLanguage = "en" [params.info] description = "A journey" title404 = "Nothing's here!
